backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and workshop registrations with access control, duplicate checks, and admin export APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main landing page layout with hero, form section, feature highlights, and integrated social-proof popups.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationForm: Registration form with validation, backend mutation, duplicate handling, and automatic WhatsApp redirect after success.
frontend/src/components/SocialProofPopup: Displays timed social-proof popups using shuffled names, random cities, and intervals while persisting shown names in storage.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Renders a floating button that opens a WhatsApp group invite link in a new tab.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout flows via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegisterMutation.t: Defines a registration mutation using the backend actor with error normalization and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines custom light/dark mode color variables for the app theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/socialProofConfig.ts: Contains configuration for social-proof popups including timing, storage, names, cities, and display options.
frontend/src/utils/socialProofState.ts: Implements state utilities for social-proof popups, including shuffling names, storage handling, and random value generators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities for clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains simple validators for full name, email, and Indian WhatsApp numbers with normalization and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappRedirect.ts: Attempts to redirect users to a WhatsApp URL, trying top-level navigation first and falling back to the current window.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, including FOMO trust indicator and social-proof popup features, with requirements and implementation notes.
